Name: macinabox
Overview:
Downloads and installs a macOS VM. Either Monterey, Big Sur, Catalina, Mojave or High Sierra. It will download the install media from Apple servers and convert it to a usable format for use for a VM. It can fully autoinstall a macOS VM on the server. Also it can prepare all files ready for a manual install if you prefer. Tools are also provided to fix the xml when the custom xml has been stripped out of the VM after its been edited by the Unraid VM manager.
## Usage
 **Operating System Version:**   Choose version from below

 - Big Sur (default)
 - Monterey
 - Catalina
 - Mojave
 - High Sierra
			
**VM Images Location:**      Location of your vm share ( default /mnt/user/domains/ )

**Install Type:** 		
   Auto install  # (This will download MacOS and install needed files into your VM location.)
   Manual- install # (This will download MacOS and put all needed files into correct place ready for easy manual install.)
 
**Vdisk size :**   The size you want your vdisk to be created

**Vdisk type:**    Set vdisk type raw or qcow2

**Opencore stock or custom:**   Select the defualt Opencore in Macinabox or use one added in macinabox appdata in the folder custom_opencore

**Delete and replace Opencore:**  Select No or Yes to delete your vms opencore image and replace with fresh one.

**Override defualt NIC type:**  Default No -  Override the default nic type in the vm going to be installed.

**VM Images Location:**  You only need to change if your VM images are not in the default location /mnt/user/domains

**VM Images Location AGAIN:**  Only needs changing if you changed the above. Location must match the above.
				 
**Isos Share Location:**  This is where macinabox will put install media and Opencore bootloader

**Isos Share Location AGAIN:** You only need to change if your ISO images are not in the default location /mnt/user/isos
                  
**appdata location:**     If you change this you will need to do the same in the macinabox help user script
Requires:
Usercripts plugin
vm_custom_icons (0ptional for the correct icons for macOS)

Install Type.Name: Install Type
Install Type.Description: Auto install to install a vm directly into Unraid. Manual for advanced install

Vdisk Size.Name: Vdisk Size
Vdisk Size.Description: Enter desired vdisk size (only used by auto install - ignored by manual install)

Vdisk Type.Name: Vdisk Type
Vdisk Type.Description: Choose vdisk type  raw or qcow2  (qcow2 takes less space)

Opencore stock or custom.Name: Opencore stock or custom
Opencore stock or custom.Description: Choose from the built in Opencore in macinabox or choose a custom one (add in appdata/macinabox/custom_opencore)

Override defualt NIC type.Name: Override defualt NIC type
Override defualt NIC type.Description:
Defualt is no
Change to override the template defualt for the NIC

VM Images Location AGAIN !!!.Name: VM Images Location AGAIN !!!
VM Images Location AGAIN !!!.Description: This must match the above VM Images Location (yes we need it twice!)

Isos Share Location AGAIN !!!.Name: Isos Share Location AGAIN !!!
Isos Share Location AGAIN !!!.Description: This must match the above Isos Share Location (yes we need it twice!)

Inject Macinabox helper scripts.Name: Inject Macinabox helper scripts
Inject Macinabox helper scripts.Description: Injects macinabox helper userscript directly into userscripts plugin

VM Images Location.Name: VM Images Location
VM Images Location.Description: Select where your vm images are stored on the server - defualt location is /mnt/user/domains/

Isos Share Location.Name: Isos Share Location
Isos Share Location.Description: Your isos share path - macOS install media will be put here.  defualt location is  /mnt/user/isos/

appdata.Name: appdata
appdata.Description: Appdata location. If you change this you will need to do the same in the macinabox help user script
